qa.name: Henrietta
qa.clothing: Flowing white dress with lace details

hf.name: Captain Blackbeard
hf.appearance: Spectral figure with a ghostly beard

tr.name: Dr. Archibald
tr.appearance: Wispy form with wild, floating hair

json_to_edit.voice_over: In death, we found purpose - a mystery that bound our spectral existence.
json_to_edit.description: Three ghosts from different eras converge in an abandoned mansion to solve a centuries-old mystery.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Creaking floorboards, distant whispers, howling wind
json_to_edit.name: Spectral Reunion
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Henrietta, Captain Blackbeard, and Dr. Archibald unite to unravel a mystery tied to their afterlives.

qa.action: The abandoned mansion looms in the moonlight, surrounded by swirling fog.

hf.action: Henrietta materializes in the grand foyer, her spectral form illuminating the dusty interior.

tr.action: Captain Blackbeard phases through a wall, his ghostly beard flowing in an otherworldly breeze.

xc.action: Dr. Archibald's glasses glint as he examines an old portrait, his translucent fingers passing through the frame.

ka.action: The camera follows the three ghosts as they float through the mansion's corridors, discussing their shared mystery.

fn.action: Henrietta peers over Dr. Archibald's shoulder as he deciphers an ancient text that hovers in the air.

af.action: Captain Blackbeard's imposing form towers over a hidden trapdoor he's discovered in the floor.

qo.action: The room tilts as the ghosts uncover a reality-bending clue that challenges their spectral perception.

fp.action: Henrietta's eyes widen in shock as she realizes the true nature of their shared connection.

va.action: The three ghosts hover together, their forms glowing brightly as they solve the mystery and prepare to move on.

edit_command: Add a new shot before each existing shot, showing the ghosts preparing for the action in the following shot. Don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot before each existing shot, showing the ghosts preparing for the action in the following shot. this will double the number of shots from 10 to 20, and we'll need to update the "number_of_shots" field accordingly. we'll create new shots with random two-letter keys and insert them into the "list_display_order" before each existing shot. the new shots will describe the ghosts' preparations, setting up the action for the following shot. we'll maintain the existing shot content and order while adding these new preparatory shots.
